verses.verse: And <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of them his <S%H4289>censer<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2004>therein<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H7126>thereon<s%>, and offered <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he had not commanded <S%H6680>them<s%>.
And there came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H4191>them<s%>, and they died <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, This is it that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them that come <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H6440>me<s%>, and before all the <S%H5971>people<s%> I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%>. And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> held his <S%H1826>peace<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1730>uncle<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7126>them<s%>, Draw near, <S%H5375>carry<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.
So they drew <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them in their <S%H3801>coats<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and unto <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, Let not the hair of your <S%H7218>heads<s%> go <S%H6544>loose<s%>, neither <S%H6533>rend<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%>; that ye <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H7107>not<s%>, and that he be not wroth with all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>: but let your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1058>bewail<s%> the <S%H8316>burning<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H8313>kindled<s%>.

And ye shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, lest ye <S%H4191>die<s%>; for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is upon <S%H6213>you<s%>. And they did according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink<s%>, <S%H1121>thou<s%>, nor thy sons with <S%H935>thee<s%>, when ye go into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, that ye <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H2708>not<s%>: it shall be a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>:
and that ye may make a <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>common<s%>, and between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>;

and that ye may <S%H3384>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto them <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and unto <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> that <S%H3498>remaineth<s%> of the <S%H4503>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> it without <S%H4682>leaven<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>;

and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, because it is thy <S%H2706>portion<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>portion<s%>, of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>: for so I am <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H8573>the<s%> <S%H2373>wave-breast<s%> and <S%H8641>the<s%> <S%H7785>heave-thigh<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, <S%H1121>thou<s%>, and thy sons, and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>thee<s%>: for they are given as thy portion, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>portion<s%>, <S%H5414>out<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

The <S%H8641><s%> <S%H7785>heave-thigh<s%> and <S%H8573>the<s%> <S%H2373>wave-breast<s%> shall they <S%H935>bring<s%> with the offerings made by <S%H801>fire<s%> of the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, to <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and it shall be <S%H1121>thine<s%>, and thy sons' with <S%H2706>thee<s%>, as a portion for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1875>diligently<s%> <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, <S%H8313>and<s%>, behold, it was burnt: and he was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and with <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Wherefore have ye not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, seeing it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> it you to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?

Behold <S%H2005><s%>, the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it was not <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%>: ye should <S%H398>certainly<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> it in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3117>Behold<s%>, this day have they <S%H7126>offered<s%> their <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> and their <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and there have <S%H7122>befallen<s%> me such things as <S%H398>these<s%>: and if I had eaten the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>, would it have been <S%H3190>well-pleasing<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3190>that<s%>, it was well-pleasing in his sight.
